title: Drawing, "Schlesinger: Sideboard", December 4, 1936
medium: Graphite, red and blue color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 7909/F.S./SCHLES., Olsson/Dec. 4. 36, 12/5/36, 1, SLOANE/12/10/36, 1; inscribed in graphite below perspective drawing, lower right: SIDEBOARD/66"x22"x35" HIGH; at right: WOOD - TEAK./GRAIN AS INDICATED./PULLS- CHROME ON BRASS/KNOBS- TEAK WITH POL. CHROM. SPINNGING/SIX DRAWERS-ONE WITH SILVER TRAY/DOOR ON RIGHT SIDE-WITH TWO SHELVES (STATIONARY); dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for sideboard. Low, rectangular sideboard in teak with various directions of the grain pattern. Rounded front right side; three stacked drawers with low horizontal pulls in chrome on brass. Three stacked drawers at left with knobs in teak with polished chrome spinning. Square reflector on top of sideboard at far left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Schlesinger: Sideboard", December 4, 1936.
December 4, 1936. Graphite, red and blue color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-815.
